askLater.speaker: Narrator
askLater.text: I can't get up the nerve to ask right now. With a gulp, I decide to ask her later.

askNow.speaker: Narrator
askNow.text: I can't bring myself to admit that it all went in one ear and out the other.

askNow.speaker: Me
askNow.text: Are you going home now? Wanna walk back with me?

happy.speaker: Narrator
happy.text: We get married shortly after that.

happy.speaker: Narrator
happy.text: Our visual novel duo lives on even after we're married...and I try my best to be more decisive.

happy.speaker: Narrator
happy.text: Together, we live happily ever after even now.

sad.speaker: Narrator
sad.text: I couldn't ask her that day and I end up never being able to ask her.

sad.speaker: Narrator
sad.text: I guess I'll never know the answer to my question now...

story.speaker: Narrator
story.text: It's only when I hear the sounds of shuffling feet and supplies being put away that I realize that the lecture's over.

story.speaker: Narrator
story.text: Professor Madden's lectures are usually interesting, but today I just couldn't concentrate on it.

story.speaker: Narrator
story.text: I've had a lot of other thoughts on my mind...thoughts that culminate in a question.

story.speaker: Narrator
story.text: It's a question that I've been meaning to ask a certain someone.

story.speaker: Narrator
story.text: When we come out of the university, I spot her right away.

story.speaker: Narrator
story.text: I've known Abby since we were kids. She's got a big heart and she's always been a good friend to me.

story.speaker: Narrator
story.text: But recently... I've felt that I want something more.

story.speaker: Narrator
story.text: More than just talking, more than just walking home together when our classes end.

story.speaker: Narrator
story.text: As soon as she catches my eye, I decide...
